name: Sandy Evolution
summary:
Sandy Evolution is a new intuitive horizontal shooter in which you eliminate your enemies and collect their fragments in order to become a stronger creature. This build currently features 1 level and a boss. Please enjoy!

Controls: Move with WASD || Shoot with down arrow || Absorb with right arrow
